Changelog
=========

1.3.0 (2017-04-13)
------------------

- The engine parameters (like pool_recycle, echo, ...)
  can be specified through a registry record
  [ale-rt]


1.2.2 (2016-06-06)
------------------

- Make action more robust on IActionSucceededEvent
  [ale-rt]


1.2.1 (2016-05-10)
------------------

- Fix unicode issues
- Tests are working again
  [ale-rt]


1.2.0 (2016-05-03)
------------------

- First public release
